summary: Build a marketing website for "Secure Health Kerala" (health insurance advisory) with defined landing-page sections, contact CTAs, and brand design settings.
architectural_notes: Brand/design settings: Primary #0A3D62 (Deep Blue), Secondary #1B9CFC (Light Blue), Background white, rounded buttons, clean & modern font.
Service area messaging: Kerala & across India.
known_issues: Domain/slug values must be 5–50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no @ or other special characters).
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Prepare a clean, web-optimized emblem asset (download-1.jpg > header-emblem-reset.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page marketing website for “Secure Health Kerala” with the provided English content and section structure: Hero, About, TATA AIG Health Insurance Plans, What Is Covered, Available Plan Options, Why Choose Secure Health Kerala, FAQ, Contact, and Footer.

Implement prominent primary call-to-action buttons for calling and WhatsApp using phone number 9495670101 in the Hero section, and make the phone number easily actionable (tel link) wherever it appears.
Add a Contact form with fields Name, Phone Number, Email, Message, and a submit button labeled “Get Free Quote”, and connect it to backend persistence so submissions are saved for later retrieval.
Apply the provided brand design settings consistently across the site: Primary color #0A3D62, secondary color #1B9CFC, white background, rounded buttons, and a clean modern typography style.

Generate and include basic static brand imagery (logo wordmark and a hero illustration) as local static assets, and render them in the UI (logo in header/top area, illustration in Hero section) without routing images through the backend.
Add a new “Advisor” section to the landing page that displays an advisor profile picture and the advisor name “Arya Vineeth” in English, styled consistently with the existing brand design.

Update the sticky header/top emblem area to clearly show the advisor designation text exactly as: "Arya Vineeth – TATA AIG Advisor", and incorporate the uploaded TATA AIG logo image as the emblem graphic (replacing the current Secure Health Kerala logo image in the header).

Replace the Advisor section profile image with the user-uploaded Arya Vineeth photo, and ensure it is displayed as a clean, centered, circular portrait consistent with the existing Advisor section styling.

Implement a clean, shareable URL hash anchor that includes Arya Vineeth + TATA AIG Advisor wording and scrolls users directly to the Advisor section when opened (e.g., visiting the site with the hash present should auto-scroll to the Advisor section).

Configure the site’s custom domain/slug name as "AryaTatainsurance" (replacing the previously invalid "Arya@Tata-Insurance") and ensure the generated shareable site URL uses this slug without validation errors.
Reset the sticky header/top emblem image to use the newly uploaded emblem image (download-1.jpg) instead of the current generated logo, while keeping the existing advisor text and call CTA unchanged.
Add an optimized static asset version of the uploaded emblem for web use and reference it from the header (place the finalized image under frontend/public/assets/).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website structure and content sections (Hero, About, TATA AIG plans, Coverage, Plan Options, Why Choose Us, FAQ, Contact Form, Footer) for Secure Health Kerala
Add prominent CTAs for Call Now and WhatsApp (9495670101) across the site
Implement contact form with fields: Name, Phone Number, Email, Message and submit button text "Get Free Quote"
Apply brand design settings: Deep Blue #0A3D62, Light Blue #1B9CFC, white background, rounded buttons, clean & modern font
Update the top emblem/header branding text to include advisor designation: "Arya Vineeth – TATA AIG Advisor"
Create a clean, shareable website link/URL path (or hash anchor) that includes Arya Vineeth + TATA AIG Advisor (e.g., /advisor/arya-vineeth or #arya-vineeth-tata-aig-advisor)
Configure a valid custom domain/slug name for the site as "AryaTatainsurance" (replacing the previously invalid "Arya@Tata-Insurance")
Reset the header/top emblem branding (emblem graphic/text) to the desired default/previous state
